title: How to make a PB&J
output:
1. Select the type of bread you want to use. Many prefer the taste of {{1}} bread, while others prefer {{2}} bread because it is healthy.
2. Choose the flavor of Jam/Jelly. I personally prefer {{3}} jam, but you can use whatever you want.
3. Choose the type of penut butter - either {{4}} or {{5}}.
4. Take out {{6}} slice(s) of bread.
5. Use a {{7}} to {{8}} the jam all over on of the pieces of bread.
6. Now {{9}} the penut butter on the other piece of bread.
7. Put them together, and you have a PB&J {{10}}.
